New Records: Anthony Edwards scored a career-high 53 points
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham scored a season-high 40 points and had nine assists
Tobias Harris contributed 16 points and 11 rebounds
Ausar Thompson added 10 points, 10 rebounds, and a career-best six steals
Julius Randle was the only other Minnesota player in double figures with 17 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit Pistons won their third straight and sixth in their last seven games
Timberwolves have now lost three in a row to drop back to the .500 mark (17-17)
With starting guard Jaden Ivey sidelined by a fractured fibula, Ausar Thompson gave the Pistons' lineup a defensive spark
